tp:docstring.p: An interface on connections to associate OLPC buddy information with contacts. Provides methods for the user to set their own information and retrieve information of contacts. User is automatically notified when information of contacts that are in his 'subscribe' contact list change.
The following types and names are used to request and set information (except for activities):

dl.dd: The color name of the buddy. Format used is #RRGGBB,#RRGGBB (stroke,fill).
The public key of the buddy.

tp:docstring.p: Activities are represented by a struct containing:

ul.li: the handle of the activity channel

tp:docstring.p: If the activity identifier is empty (""), the handle is ignored and there is no current activity.
